messages.subject: Re: For All Harry Potter Lovers
messages.msgSnippet: If you go to http://www.amazon.co.uk they have an excerpt from the new one (though v.short - not long enough to keep your sons happy, I m afraid) - it s been
messages.messageBody:
If you go to http://www.amazon.co.uk they have an excerpt from the new one
(though v.short - not long enough to keep your sons happy, I'm afraid) -
it's been out here in the UK for a while now, and it's brilliant!!!

~Annie~

messages.subject: For All Harry Potter Lovers
messages.msgSnippet: We have recently finished the first two HP books, and my sons are going crazy, moaning and groaning about not having a HP to read at night.  I drag it out, one
messages.messageBody:
We have recently finished the first two HP books, and my sons are going
crazy, moaning and groaning about not having a HP to read at night. I drag
it out, one chapter a night, no cheating! However, my oldest, the one that
hates to read, started to go ahead and read the next chapter after I went out
of the room. He thought he was cheating on me! LOL, little did he know that
I bought the books to get him hooked on reading!!
Anyway, to the point! When we were at the book store last week, I asked
about a date for the next HP, First of September!!!!! Yea ! Just to let
you know.
Teresa
